name: ETHINYLESTRADIOL - ETHINYLESTRADIOL
cautions: Cautions cardiovascular disease (sodium retention with oedema, thromboembolism); see also under Combined Hormonal Contraceptives (section 7.3.1) and under Oestrogens for HRT
side-effects: Side-effects feminising effects in men; see also under Combined Hormonal Contraceptives (section 7.3.1) and under Oestrogens for HRT
doses:
Menopausal symptoms and osteoporosis prophylaxis, (with
progestogen for 12–14 days per cycle in women with intact uterus),
10–50 micrograms daily for 21 days, repeated after 7-day tablet-free
period

Female hypogonadism, 10–50 micrograms daily, usually on cyclical
basis; initial oestrogen therapy should be followed by combined oestrogen
and progestogen therapy

Menstrual disorders, 20–50 micrograms daily from day 5 to 25
of each cycle, with progestogen added either throughout the cycle
or from day 15 to 25
pregnancy: Pregnancy see Combined Hormonal Contraceptives, section 7.3.1

indications:
